title: Shao Hua Long: Rebirth Of The Evil Concubine’S Counterattack

status: Shao Hua Long: Rebirth of the Evil Concubine's Counterattack; Shao Hua Long: Chong Sheng Zhi E Fei Ni Xi; Sháo Huá Lóng: Chóng Shēng Zhī È Fēi Nì Xí; 韶华珑：重生之恶妃逆袭
description:
Description :
        Shao Hua Long: Rebirth of the Evil Concubine's Counterattack, Shao Hua Long: Chong Sheng Zhi E Fei Ni Xi, Sho Hu Lng: Chng Shng Zh  Fi N X,  at manhua websiteThe noble concubine Wan Hualong was only one step away from the throne, but she was seriously ill and trapped in the palace for seven years. Before her death, she knew that the emperor married her only to use the power of her family to claim the throne. In this life, he was poisoned by pillowman and betrayed by his biological father. After being reincarnated, with the means of her previous life, she got rid of her fianc, took revenge on her miserable father and stepmother, and let her bullies learn a lesson. After escaping from all the evil fates in his previous life, he ran the first silver building in the world and finally embarked on the Shaohua road.Recommend for you !
